creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Richard A. Hunter
description: carved wooden plaque with hooks for keys; swing-arm lamp with ornate shade at center; bell with sign in LRQ:  "PLEASE RING / FOR CLERK"; small portrait of a man hanging on door frame in URQ
marks: Signature and Stamp LRC, in pencil: [Arthur Rothstein]
title: Hotel de Paris, interior, Georgetown, Colorado
